name: Hostile Waters: Antaeus Rising
summary: Hostile Waters, released as Hostile Waters: Antaeus Rising in America, is a hybrid vehicle and strategy game released on the PC in 2001 by the British company Rage Games Limited. It was inspired by an earlier game known as Carrier Command (Realtime Games, 1988).
info:
• 中文名: 敌对水域：安泰崛起
  • 别名: 恶水之战
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Strategy
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2001年3月23日
